text: @BuckSexton Short term memory?  #nygovernor placed thousands of vulnerable seniors in jeopardy ordering Nursing Homes to accept Covid19 patients.  Over 6,000 innocent seniors lost their lives because of #AndrewCuomo.  I doubt he’s a good role model.
